title: What scientific idea has not had a far reaching impact on society? - Quora

response.answer_text: Determinism. This says loud and clear that there are no autonomous entities with free will or volition and yet almost all of the 8 billion+ humans believe strongly in their own individuality and autonomy! Your ego is the most important thing! Anyone who believes in determinism (that includes all the scientists) must necessarily be truly humble and yet that is not what we observe in society. Ego is the biggest problem facing humanity.
